about_the_game:
In this “Flight” hearted adventure, a wingless owl is determined to overcome their limits by learning more about the world, exploring uncharted islands, helping others to reach their goals, and finally achieve your dream: to be able to fly! This cozy coming-of-age journey will takes you to far off lands through a story of dreams, friendship and community.

Swing through the skies

In a land of floating islands and an endless ocean, the laws of physics are fractured and hosts numerous fun, fantastical feats! Floating lakes, frantic gusts of wind, and curious ocean creatures flying around. You are armed with a grappling hook to traverse the world, collect stamps to trade for upgrades, and feathers to build wings!

Explore an open world full of secrets and colourful characters

Meet friendly faces that are rooting for you and happy to help. From Barcelos, a local legend striving for perfection, to Henrietta, a young chief wise beyond her years, all the residents have something you can learn from.

Earn stamps to upgrade your grappling hook

Explore deeper into the unchartered islands by customising your grappling hook. Swing from clouds, zipline across canyons, float on water, and more! Experiment with upgrades to create unique combinations.
